dublin_core.dcvalue: Developmental delay is a deviation development from the normative milestones during the childhood and it may be caused by neurological disorders Early stimulation is a standardized and simple technique to treat developmental delays in children aged 0 3 years allowing them to reach the best development possible and to mitigate neuropsychomotor sequelae However the outcomes of the treatment depending on the involvement of the family to continue the activities at home on a daily basis To empower and educate parents of children with neurodevelopmental delays to administer standardized early stimulation programs at home we developed a mobile early stimulation program that provides timely and evidence based clinical decision support to health professionals and a personalized guidance to parents about how to administer early stimulation to their child at home
Studies in health technology and informatics
A Mobile Early Stimulation Program to Support Children with Developmental Delays in Brazil.
